entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:41 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.8°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -39.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
